content: For https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/71274 two cargotest projects need bumping (no upstream changes required, but the old commits are from 2018 and depend on known-broken versions of crossbeam and other crates). Is there any process associated with that?
Cc @matklad @Pietro Albini (you seem to have done cargotest changes fairly recently)
Yeah, I did just bump them, but then my changes failed the crater misearebly :-( Haven't got to triaging that yet
I dont see the relation to crater, but my bump landed so ripgrep and tokei are slightly less outdated now ;)
